FuncDef: The authorization-cmd no-response-policy command configures a policy used when the command line-based authorization mode. The undo authorization-cmd no-response-policy command restores the default setting. By default, the policy is used to keep the user online though the authorization fails.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that the user is online when the command line-based authorization fails.
-

Indicates that the user is offline when the command line-based authorization fails.
-

Specifies the number of times of failed command line-based authorization.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 10. The default value is 5.
